lexUnit.definition: FN: an acoustic output percieved as being a low volume

sentence.text: ` I shall be so quiet you 'll never notice me .
After five minutes of running water , scraping plates and chinking glass type noises , it went very quiet in the kitchen but I do n't think her old man noticed .
Stephen 's voice had gone very quiet .
The mechanism of the big wheel was remarkably quiet .
His voice was still very quiet and calm .
The landlady was very kind and helpful , but the hotel was not really quiet enough for him .
I listen for noises , but it 's real quiet .
I was as quiet as I could be , but all the same , I ca n't help wondering if at some stage he realised I was on his heels .
The house was so quiet .
When Miss Maine left the office was very quiet .
With the chatter of the sitcom dead , the room seemed unnaturally quiet .
It became very quiet in the plane .
The house was very quiet after they had gone .
It 's usually fairly quiet at lunchtime .
With setts that I watch regularly , I usually talk to myself in a low , quiet voice as I arrive and just before I leave .
The auditorium was quiet enough to hear a pin drop .

When the evening promenade disperses , the streets of the old city are usually quiet , dark , and practically deserted , though the small streets between Plaa de La Llotja and Plaa la Reina teem with restaurants and bars .
Or the virtual impossibility of finding a quiet place to study or even think , so that the children can cope in school and one day have a chance of achieving something better ?

We sat grown quiet at the name of love ; We saw the last embers of daylight die , And in the trembling blue - green of the sky A moon , worn as if it had been a shell Washed by time 's waters as they rose and fell About the stars and broke in days and years .
Just stay quiet . ''

The Phantom Menace : A film with half a plot , no engaging characters to speak of , and actors who speak in inhibited - zombie monotones as if the director had warned them to keep quiet while someone on the set took a nap .
Satisfied with their vital signs , she left them to drift a while ; both were quiet for what seemed to be quite a long time , until the same female reappeared with a clipboard and a cel phone .
awake , listening : laughter of guest love-makers trying to be more quiet
Companies offer dark , quiet nap rooms , reasoning that midday naps help workers maintain focus .
Bolten watched the exchanges and , after what he called `` a quiet moment , '' suggested that the Vice President get in touch with the President and confirm the engage order .

Here are a few of the methods of child - restraint practiced by our forefathers and foremothers -- many of whom were patriotic , religious , and of high moral character : swaddling their children , depriving them of food ( it was thought to keep babies quiet ) , tying them to chairs , and beating them severely .
It 's also quiet when they 're in church ( hey , I 'm from the Midwest , OK ? )
For a different vision of Old China , spend a few quiet moments in the classic Lou Lim Ieoc Garden .
